title: MC崩溃，会看的大佬进来

replies.author: 极光酋长
replies.txt_content:
Unable to fit: FlansMod:ak - size: 520x520 - Maybe try a lowerresolution resourcepack?复制代码
  Flans Mod Plus 这个Mod加载材质的时候gg了，搬运帖：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-496411-1-1.html
  请尝试更新或者删除

replies.author: gouj511
replies.txt_content: 你的资源包有问题，请换一个低分辨率的资源包

replies.txt_content:
